  • treebo - Regional Quality Controller

    Other August 01, 2022

    For the uninitiated, Treebo is a new age hotel brand offering comfortable stays at budget prices. Staying at budget hotels has always meant making compromises on quality. Well, not anymore. At Treebo, we are putting dignity back into budget travel with our unmatched 100% Quality Guarantee. Founded in 2015, we currently operate more than 400 properties across 80 locations in India. We are hell bent on changing the way customer experience is delivered in the industry. So if you are passionate about being part of a truly game-changing team, look no more. This might just be the perfect opportunity for you!!

    Read More →

  • swiggy - Deputy Unit Manager

    Other August 01, 2022

    • Implement the identified plans for sales increase and also execute the plans laid out by the marketing team to achieve the AOP (Annual Operating Plan) target for the unit and to enhance customer experience.
    • Analyze data to assess the growth of the unit and conduct gap analysis. Review the Daily Sales Report (DSR), the weekly and monthly sales of the unit, and work towards bridging the gaps identified.
    • Establish the organization defined customer service norms within the unit and ensure the complaints are within targets through initiatives such as regular training and process audits.
    • Interact with fleet managers for timely assigning of DEs and for feedback or issues if any.
    • Work with the Catalogue team and/or Cluster manager to ensure correction in menu discrepancies.
    • Responsible for organizing the stock and equipment, ordering supplies and overseeing kitchen maintenance, cleanliness and security.
    • Cross check Indent and ensure availability of all products at all times based on the sales forecasts while ensuring that the unit does not hold excess stock and avoiding spillage.
    • Ensure a proper inventory is maintained and the Goods Received Notes (GRN) process is followed to acertain optimum utilization of resources.
    • Liaise with the Supply Chain Management (SCM) team for decisions on the stock supply. Coordinate with the Chefs to share stock projections (based on Promotions/ Marketing activities) in order to ensure smooth SCM.
    • Review MIS with the Cluster Manager & Unit Chef (Mid Month & Monthly) and maintain MIS reports for income and expenditure of the respective kitchen.
    • Conduct fortnightly audits, maintain an opening and closing checklist to ensure the SOP guidelines, hygiene and safety standard are being followed.
    • Liaise with the Finance team to ensure timely payments to vendors, interactions for inventory management, fluctuations / deviations in expenses and stock levels.
    • Interact with the Food Technologist, R&D Chefs, external auditors etc. to ensure a smooth audit is conducted at the Unit.
    • Track and analyze metrics to ensure reduction in food wastage, food costs, preparation and delivery time to increase opportunities for profitability and customer satisfaction.
    • Ensure all statutory compliances are adhered to at the unit, and plan manpower deployment (Duty Rosters etc.) in line with the productivity and potential output of the unit.
    • Cross check petty cash expenses for the unit and ensure petty cash expenses are reduced.
    • Responsible for orienting, coaching employees and setting expectations for work processes and behaviors. Conduct periodic reviews / daily briefing to ensure team meets expectations.
    • Control attrition by ensuring frequent R&R activities, implementation of incentive plans, periodic training and engagement programmes for the employees.
    • Set up a grievance redressal mechanism for employees to approach in case of any issues. Conduct one-on-one with each team member at least once a month.
    • Ensure conduction of trainings at the unit level to train employees on the SOPs. Groom a few selected employees to take on the responsibilities of the next level.
    • Ensure compliance to all necessary food safety regulations in the unit. Ensure basic hygiene is in place. Identify and implement innovative solutions to aid food safety in the assigned unit.
    • Ensure the safety/ risks are highlighted and safe behavior displayed within the kitchens. Track safety scorecard to correct the near-misses and conduct RCA for safety and to develop corrective action plans.
    • Ensure adherence to the set SOPs across the unit.
    • Work with the Cluster manager to identify process improvement opportunities and implement them for delivering better and faster output in the unit.

    Read More →

    Other July 01, 2022

    Pepper (www.peppercontent.in) is building India’s largest content marketplace that brings companies and content creators together to scale up content creation processes across 10 content verticals and 150+ content categories, 40+ content verticals, and 40+ global languages. Over the past 3 years, we’ve worked with brands like Adobe, upGrad, Swiggy, Dunzo, BusinessWorld, Digit, Shiksha.com, Rapido, BookMyShow, UrbanClap, Yatra, Bewakoof, YourStory, Bharat Matrimony, and 300+ other brands. With a growing network of 50,000+ freelance creative minds, we thrive to become a one-stop solution for the content needs of the world’s biggest brands—and we have fun doing it.   • peppercontent - Category Manager

    Other July 01, 2022

    Pepper (www.peppercontent.in) is building India’s largest content marketplace that brings companies and content creators together to scale up content creation processes across 10 content verticals and 150+ content categories, 40+ content verticals, and 40+ global languages. Over the past 3 years, we’ve worked with brands like Adobe, upGrad, Swiggy, Dunzo, BusinessWorld, Digit, Shiksha.com, Rapido, BookMyShow, UrbanClap, Yatra, Bewakoof, YourStory, Bharat Matrimony, and 300+ other brands. We have over 30,000+ writers and graphic designers who have applied to Pepper so far, who form part of the ‘Pepper Cloud’.

    We are on the path to building a global on-demand content marketplace platform that allows for collaboration, discovery and upskilling for all our creators. Now we are in a rapid expansion phase to enter into more content service offerings, engage a wide spectrum of content creators and at the same time, scale up our existing services.

  • udaan - Direct Taxation

    Other Finance June 02, 2022

    Founded in 2016 with a vision to 'transform the trade ecosystem in India leveraging technology,’ udaan is India’s largest business-to-business e-commerce platform. It has operations across categories including fruits and vegetables, FMCG, staples, lifestyle, electronics, home & kitchen, pharma, toys and general merchandise.

    udaan is solving core trade problems faced by small and medium businesses, that are unique to India, through its unique India-fit low-cost business model by leveraging technology and bringing the benefits of eCommerce to them. It is a one stop shop for all business requirements in the b2b space. udaan has built inclusive tech tools for Bharat, specially catering to the needs of brands, retailers and manufacturers, providing them a level playing field to scale, trade and grow businesses.

    Read More →

  • udaan - Modelling Analyst

    Sales Support Finance Other April 13, 2022

    udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

    udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of Udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

  • udaan - Underwriter

    Other Support Udaan October 06, 2021

    udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

    udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of Udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.
